channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite

item.title: CVE-2020-26184|2024-09-16T17:33:28.028Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions prior to 4.5.1, contain an Improper Certificate Validation vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2020-29508|2024-09-16T16:13:48.635Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition, versions before 4.1.5, and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions before 4.6, contain an Improper Input Validation Vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28074|2024-08-20T16:31:10.234Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition, version 4.1.5, and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions 4.0 through 4.6.1 and version 5.0, contains an Out-of-bounds Read vulnerability. An unauthenticated attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information exposure.

item.title: CVE-2023-28074|2024-08-01T17:46:14.672Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition 4.1.5 and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions 4.0 through 4.6.1 and version 5.0 contain a buffer over-read vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2023-28074|2024-07-31T07:56:01.652Z -- dell -- dell%20bsafe%20micro%20edition%20suite
item.description: Dell BSAFE Crypto-C Micro Edition 4.1.5 and Dell BSAFE Micro Edition Suite, versions 4.0 through 4.6.1 and version 5.0 contain a buffer over-read vulnerability.
